Name: REBCO
Sentence: Historically, most of the studies were focused on YBa 2 Cu 3 O 7-x (YBCO or Y-123 phase), since it was the first REBCO compound discovered with a critical temperature (T c ) higher than liquid nitrogen temperature (77 K) and it is relatively easily prepared as bulk or thin film.
